articles.title: British Steel set to cut up to 2,000 jobs in furnace closure plan - BBC.com
articles.description: British Steel confirms a plan to close two blast furnaces at its Scunthorpe plant.
articles.content:
British Steel has confirmed it plans to close down its blast furnaces in Scunthorpe, putting up to 2,000 jobs at risk.

articles.title: 'Oceans are hugely complex': modelling marine microbes is key to climate forecasts - Nature.com
articles.description: Microorganisms are the engines that drive most marine processes. Ocean modelling must evolve to take their biological complexity into account.
